response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the book without any errors. Now, the robot needs to grasp the book.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the book.
(2) Grasp the book.
(3) Move the robot to the carton.
(4) Put the book in the carton.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Grasp the book
    book = registry(env, "hardback_188")
    EasyGrasp(robot, book)
    donothing(env)
